subnations.name: Aysun Turannor
special: Members from this faction will never lie, or break any promise, and will be openly honest about matters. Additionally, members from this faction will by default notice dishonesty. Members from this faction also have the following oaths by default, being sworn as soon as they are capable of speech and understanding. The last oath can be dissolved by mutual agreement with the other party.Kinship: You shall treat your kinsmen with hospitality, generosity and reciprocity, for as long as they are deserving of it.Faith: You shall carry the rites of the Old Mother.Moon: You shall serve the Old Mother. She shall reward you for your service.

name: Al Nasser Turannor
special: Members from this faction Will never lie, or break any promise, and will be openly honest about matters. Additionally, members from this faction will by default notice dishonesty.

Oaths: Kinship (You shall treat your kinsmen with hospitality, generosity and reciprocity, for as long as they are deserving of it.), Friendship (You shall treat the kindred of the Anatol as esteemed friends, as long as they reciprocate, and their acts do not go against your oaths.), Faith (You shall carry the rites of the Old Mother and Alsham.), Wrath (You shall wage war on the Mukhlis Turannor. Your Kinsmen shall reward you.)

name: Hashna Turannor
special: Members from this faction Will never lie, or break any promise, and will be openly honest about matters. Additionally, members from this faction will by default notice dishonesty.

Oaths: Kinship (You shall treat your kinsmen with hospitality, generosity and reciprocity, for as long as they are deserving of it.), Friendship (You shall treat the kindred of the Anatol as esteemed friends, as long as they reciprocate, and their acts do not go against your oaths.), Faith (You shall carry the rites of Alsham.), Law (You shall exercise The Law of Alsham as long as it aligns with the law of the land. Alsham shall reward you.)

name: Al Damawi Turannor
special: Members from this faction Will never lie, or break any promise, and will be openly honest about matters. Additionally, members from this faction will by default notice dishonesty.

Oaths: Kinship (You shall treat your kinsmen with hospitality, generosity and reciprocity, for as long as they are deserving of it.), Friendship (You shall treat the kindred of the Anatol as esteemed friends, as long as they reciprocate, and their acts do not go against your oaths.), Faith (You shall carry the rites of the Old Mother, Alsham, and the Cult of Blood.), Hunger (You shall aid any kinsmen or allied thing that hungers for blood, meat or soul. On successful quenching of their hunger, they shall reward you.)

name: Al Murán Turannor
special: Members from this faction Will never lie, or break any promise, and will be openly honest about matters. Additionally, members from this faction will by default notice dishonesty.

Oaths: Kinship (You shall treat your kinsmen with hospitality, generosity and reciprocity, for as long as they are deserving of it.), Friendship (You shall treat the kindred of the Anatol as esteemed friends, as long as they reciprocate, and their acts do not go against your oaths.), Faith (You shall carry the rites of the Old Mother and Alsham.), Shield (You shall protect any kinsmen or allied thing under danger of death. On successful saving of their life, they shall reward you.)

name: Al Hisan Turannor
special: Members from this faction Will never lie, or break any promise, and will be openly honest about matters. Additionally, members from this faction will by default notice dishonesty.

Oaths: Kinship (You shall treat your kinsmen with hospitality, generosity and reciprocity, for as long as they are deserving of it.), Friendship (You shall treat the kindred of the Anatol as esteemed friends, as long as they reciprocate, and their acts do not go against your oaths.), Faith (You shall carry the rites to the Old Mother and Alsham), Hunt (You shall hunt slavers and free those in chains under them. The priests and rulers shall reward you.)

name: Al Nehir Turannor
special: Members from this faction Will never lie, or break any promise, and will be openly honest about matters. Additionally, members from this faction will by default notice dishonesty.

Oaths: Kinship (You shall treat your kinsmen with hospitality, generosity and reciprocity, for as long as they are deserving of it.), Friendship (You shall treat the kindred of the Anatol as esteemed friends, as long as they reciprocate, and their acts do not go against your oaths.), Faith (You shall carry the rites of the Old Mother, Alsham and Anhur.), Crown (You shall serve the Sultan of Altyn Nehir for as long as it is righteous. The Sultan shall reward your service.)

name: Noker Turannor
special: Members from this faction Will never lie, or break any promise, and will be openly honest about matters. Additionally, members from this faction will by default notice dishonesty.

Oaths: Kinship (You shall treat your kinsmen with hospitality, generosity and reciprocity, for as long as they are deserving of it.), Friendship (You shall treat the kindred of the Anatol as esteemed friends, as long as they reciprocate, and their acts do not go against your oaths.), Faith (You shall carry the rites of the Old Mother, Anhur and Alsham.), Hatred (You shall lay waste to all blood sorcerers, vampires and their kin. The rulers of your land shall reward you.)

subnations.name: Mukhlis Turannor
subnations.special: Members from this faction will never lie, or break any promise, and will be openly honest about matters. Additionally, members from this faction will by default notice dishonesty. Members from this faction also have the following oaths by default: Kinship, Friendship, Faith, and Wrath (against the Al Nasser Turannor). The last oath can be dissolved by mutual agreement with the other party.

subnations.name: Raktayana
unique_feat: ~uf^Raktachuna~# (Casting of 3 sangromancy spells without spell slot, once per LR each)

subnations.name: Kamsarjati
unique_feat: ~uf^Kamsarchuna~# (Second Wind + Durable when healed by sangromancy spells)

subnations.name: Emirate of Dhul-Janan
feats: ~fn^Weapon Master (Khopesh, Portable Ballista, Recurve Bow, War Spear)~#
unique_feat: ~uf^Beacon of Alsham~# (Artificer initiate + Light cantrip now has more light and pierces magical darkness)

subnations.name: Emirate of Kharandun
unique_feat: ~uf^Tunnel Trapper~# (Enemies have disadvantage on checks to find and disarm traps placed by you, can place made traps as a bonus action, which are immediately hidden if possible. Can dig a trap within a minute)

subnations.name: Emirate of Shamsul-Zahra
unique_feat: ~uf^Dust Dervish~# (Hide in lightly obscured dust clouds, extra attack from attack action when attacking whilst hidden)

subnations.name: Emirate of Wādī al-Qamar
unique_feat: ~uf^Eyes of The Dial~# (free casting of a divination spell, adv on checks for divination spells)

subnations.name: Lokajathi
unique_feat: ~uf^Roughmarcher~# (Half CON feat + Short rest on 30 minutes, Long rest on 6 hours)

name: Denizens of the Great Marsh
spells: ~sn^Conjure Swamp Spirit (Toad of Monsoons, Snail of Droughts, Catfish of Floods)~#

name: Kaliasa
unique_feat: ~uf^Font of Ki~# (Straight up Ki points, half the PC level + half WIS score, but no techniques)

subnations.name: Nahari
unique_feat: ~uf^Way of The River Warden~# (+2 to AC while wielding a dueling blade/halberd and nothing but light armor. You learn one sword bard flourish, and you gain 2 bardic inspirations which you may only use for flourishes. Your die for the flourish is a d6 unless it is bigger)

subnations.name: Imrathi
unique_feat: ~uf^Hidden in scents~# (Stealth stuff bonus while incense is in the air)

name: Parvat Lanka
unique_feat: ~uf^Soul Smith~# (Make magical items out of souls, enchant magical items by consuming souls)

name: Rajyam of Agnipur: Azur (The Purest of The Pure)
unique_feat: ~uf^Fireborn~# (Supercharged magic init, but for fire spells, like 4th level)

name: Rajyam of Agnipur: Ashkhal (The Ashen Horsemen)
unique_feat: ~uf^Ashborn~# (Mix of Tough and freecast of Ashen Self)

name: Rajyam of Ahigara: Naukar
spells: ~sn^Summon Swamp Spirit (Toad of Monsoons, Snail of Droughts, Catfish of Floods)~#
unique_feat: ~uf^Voice of The Jungle~# (Magic Initiate + , but for druid spells)

name: Rajyam of Kalagiri: Kalajnani (Interpreters of Wisdom)
unique_feat: ~uf^Sage~# (Reliable talent for all INT&WIS skills, even without prof. Cost of scroll scribing/writing into spell book halved)

name: Rajyam of Kalagiri: Bhritaka (The Learned Servants)
Rajyam of Saan Jangal: Ourokaran (Those of The Cycle)
unique_feat: ~uf^Ouroboros~# (Be one size larger, become an abominable amalgam of several Yuan Ti. Much like the Virajte transformation)

name: Rajyam of Saan Jangal: Vanpravartin (The Whisperers of The Jungle)
spells: ~sn^Summon Swamp Spirit (Serpent of Rebirth, Ox of The Plague, Dove of Past Omens)~#
unique_feat: ~uf^Wood Molder~# (Ability to cast Mold Earth, but affecting living trees to mold instead, +1 to WIS)

name: Rajyam of Saan Jangal: Jeevanjati (Those Born to Live)
unique_feat: ~uf^Master Cobbler~# (Prof in 4 tools of choice, expertise if already proficient)

name: Rajyam of Saan Jangal: Niranvritti (Those Who Will Not Be Reborn)
unique_feat: ~uf^Dreg Resilience~# (Necrotic Damage Resistance, adv on saves against disease and poisons, prof on one saving throw of choice)

name: Rajyam of Surangara: Suryavanshi (The Children of The Sun)
unique_feat: ~uf^Honor Duelist~# (Once per SR, challenge a creature to 1v1 Duel. If duel is negated or won, gain inspiration until end of next SR. If duel is interrupted, immediate free attack towards any creature)

name: Rajyam of Surangara: Suravritta (The Sun’s Witnesses)
unique_feat: ~uf^Sun’s Own~# (Durable, but instead of double HP, Max HP gained from hit die spent during short resting under sunlight)

name: Rajyam of Surangara: Vajrabha (Those of The Hoof)
unique_feat: ~uf^Beastcatcher~# (Their weapons trip and entangle properties count as one size larger)

name: Rajyam of Surangara: Mrityahara (The Carriers of Death)
unique_feat: ~uf^Sacramental~# (Free LR cast of Dark Sacrament spell without the extra added damage or hit die consumption, can give the benefits to self or other)

name: Rajyam of Tomoruul, The Ironmongers in Lockstep
unique_feat: ~uf^Chainlink~# (+1 STR, can wield heavy weapons without penalty, Benefits from the Help action to attack for all the attacks of an attack action)

name: Rajyam of Vanadhara: The Pravatta (Servants of The Great Trees)
unique_feat: ~uf^Chosen Servant~# (Always know the location of the closest Great Tree, spellcasting bonus when casting spells within forests)

name: Rajyam of Vanadhara: The Vrataya (The People of The Forest)
unique_feat: ~uf^Gift of The Forest~# (Goodberry, Leomund's tiny hut freecast per LR)

name: Rajyam of Zahar: Nāgarājya (The Serpent Druids)
unique_feat: ~uf^Snaketongue~# (Speak with snakes and reptiles, use WIS stat for charisma checks)

name: Rajyam of Zahar: Tambrawana (Those Clad in Bronze)
unique_feat: ~uf^Venom Warrior~# (Adv on enemies that are under the effects of a poison, enemies have disadv on saves against poisons if the poison was inflicted with an attack that had advantage)

name: Rajyam of Zahar: Nadijanah (The River Folk)
unique_feat: ~uf^Snake Oil~# (Make healing potions out of venom doses per gp value. 25gp equals one potion)

name: Shonitagiri, Temple of Blood
unique_feat: ~uf^Twiceborn~# (Half Orc 1 hit point feature + CON save prof)

name: Samvara: The Ocean People
unique_feat: ~uf^Waverider~# (Faster speed and higher jump distance when riding a sea creature in open sea, can hold breath for longer and swim faster)

name: Asrava : The Coast People
unique_feat: ~uf^Lore Beneath The Waves~# (Package of Primordial spells learned)

name: Maathriheen: Sayad (Sword of The Maathriheen)
unique_feat: ~uf^Aspirant of the Four Cardinals~# (Grants all four holy hydromancies as freecasts)

name: Maathriheen: Rakshak (Healers of The River)
unique_feat: ~uf^Tillers of the Riverbanks~# (Ritual casting of Flood of Naaghrada and Tide of Naaghrada, but only as rituals)
